title: 1950 Roy Campanella RPPC FS with Campy handwriting

posts.post_title: 1950 Roy Campanella RPPC FS with Campy handwriting
posts.post_content:
F.S. 1950 Roy Campanella RPPC with his handwriting on back. $675 obo. Shipped. Same postcard sold last night without handwriting in Love of The Game for $630 plus tax ad shipping. PP or Venmo.

[url]https://bid.loveofthegameauctions.com/bids/bidplace?itemid=39237[/url]
